content: Hello, I am interested in contributing to Lean. I have a PhD in economics/game theory and BS in math, and have also published in computational complexity and theoretical physics. I have worked through the games, tutorials, and books, and thought I would contribute to mathlib, for instance, on rational functions (see my post under "Is there code for").

Hello, I am interested in contributing to Lean. I have a PhD in economics/game theory and BS in math, and have also published in computational complexity and theoretical physics. I have worked through the games, tutorials, and books, and thought I would contribute to mathlib, for instance, on rational functions (see my post under "Is there code for").
Welcome! We have some info for new contributors (mostly about style and workflow) here. Feel free to ask any questions here on Zulip too!
